document_data.caption: Anteos Lane on a circa [[1357 DR]] map of [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.name: Anteos Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Anteos Lane''' was a street of hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]]<ref name=CoS.M"> in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This street ran from east to west, coming southwest off of [[Trollkill Street]] and curving eastward. It eventually turned northeast and terminated into [[Brassfeather Lane]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Anteos Villa]], the family estate of the noble house [[Anteos]], stood on the corner of Anteos Lane and Trollkill Street.
* [[Brossfeather Villa]], the family estate of the noble house [[Brossfeather]], stood on the corner of Anteos Lane and Brassfeather Lane.
* [[Phull Villa]], the family estate of the noble house [[Phull]], stood directly between Anteos Lane and [[Phull Lane]].
